hero.title: Icelandic Purity Meets Belgian Elegance
hero.subtitle: Taramar brings the untouched nature of Iceland to your skin. Organic skincare available at INNO Belgium.

about.headline: ENDORSED BY
about.title: Dagny Rós Ásmundsdóttir
about.subtitle: Icelandic chef and TV personality.
about.descHeadline: FOR DAGNY Rós PURITY ISN’T A TREND, IT’S A WAY OF LIFE.
about.desc: From the wild herbs she cooks with to the care she gives her skin, every choice is guided by respect for nature and science.

aboutIngredients.headline: Dagny Rós and taramar share a Philosophy -
aboutIngredients.desc: Handpicked arctic botanicals, from the virgin nature of Iceland. Using [[bold]]NoTox® Biofermentation[[/bold]], ingredients are transformed into gentle, skin-compatible actives.
aboutIngredients.desc2: The result is skincare that feels [[bold]]calm, light, and alive[[/bold]] – just like Iceland itself.

quote.quoteHead: When I discovered Taramar, it felt like home. It’s skincare made with the same integrity I bring to my kitchen -
quote.quoteTitle: no toxins, no shortcuts, only what’s real.
quote.author: - Dagny Rós Ásmundsdóttir

founders.headline: THE FOUNDERS’ STORY
founders.title: Born From Science [[newline]]And Personal Need
founders.desc: The Taramar story began when, after recovering from Lyme disease, Icelandic marine biologist [[bold]]Prof. Gudrun Marteinsdottir[[/bold]], suddenly became sensitive to skincare she once tolerated. She and her husband, food-science [[bold]]Prof. Kristberg Kristbergsson[[/bold]], set out to create toxin-free formulas that combined indigenous ingredients  with legendary Icelandic vitality.
founders.desc2: Years of research led to [[bold]]NoTox® Biofermentation[[/bold]] - a natural process that transforms wild Icelandic plants into high-purity, skin-compatible actives.
founders.desc3: Every drop of Taramar reflects that journey: [[bold]]slow science, clean ingredients, no compromise.[[/bold]]

products.headline: THE TARAMAR COLLECTION
products.subtitle: Seven clean, pure formulations that bring harmony to your daily ritual — all handmade in small batches in Iceland.

items.title: The Serum
items.desc: Silky hydration with fermented sea kelp and arctic thyme.

items.title: Day Treatment
items.desc: Daily nourishment that leaves the skin balanced and smooth.

items.title: Night Treatment
items.desc: Rich and nurturing. Designed for comfort while you rest.

items.title: Eye Treatment
items.desc: Cooling, gentle, and fragrance-free. Perfect for delicate skin.

items.title: Purifying Treatment
items.desc: Clarifies and refreshes without stripping natural oils.

items.title: Arctic Flower Treatment
items.desc: Softens and illuminates with wildflower extracts.

items.title: Rejuvenating Oil
items.desc: Pure botanical oils for supple, glowing skin.

experience.headline: EXPERIENCE
experience.title: The Taramar Ritual
experience.desc: Now at select INNO locations across Belgium, you can experience the purity of Icelandic skincare first-hand.
experience.desc2: Discover the textures, scents, and slow ritual that define Taramar.
experience.desc3: Our skincare advisors will guide you through each step of your personal routine.

videoSection.author: - Dagny Rós
videoSection.desc: From her Icelandic kitchen to your skincare routine, [[bold]]Dagny Rós believes in only one standard: purity.[[/bold]]
videoSection.desc2: Her collaboration with Taramar brings together two worlds: food-grade ingredients and scientific precision.

items.quote: The most honest skincare I’ve ever used.
items.author: ELISE D.

items.quote: It’s like my skin finally exhaled.
items.author: SOFIE G.

items.quote: Clean, calm, and effortlessly elegant — just like Dagny herself.
items.author: MARIE A.

stores.headline: FIND TARAMAR AT INNO
stores.desc: Now available in select INNO stores across Belgium:
stores.desc2: Experience the Taramar ritual in person.

newsletter.title: Join The Taramar Circle
newsletter.subtitle: OUR COMMUNITY NEWSLETTER
newsletter.desc: In Iceland we always strive to help each other and share what knowledge we have with one another. Join our community and receive exclusive updates on new research batches, skincare insights, and in-store events with Dagny Rós.
